definition: Hulunbeir league (equivalent to prefecture), Inner Mongolia

sentences.english: Wang spent six years of his early childhood living on the Hulun Buir Prairie.
sentences.chinese: 王吉安在呼伦贝尔大草原度过了六年的童年时光。

sentences.english: HulunBuir Grassland is endangered by a new phase of sandy desertification.
sentences.chinese: 呼伦贝尔沙质草原正面临新一轮沙漠化的严重威胁。
